wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Jean Burgess (born 7 December 1949) is a former Scottish National Party (SNP) politician. She was the Minister for Housing and Welfare from 2012 to 2016, and the Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the Cunninghame South constituency from 2011 to 2016.

response: Irene Hamilton-Oldfather (born 1954 in Glasgow) is a Scottish Labour Party politician.About Irene Oldfather. Scottish Labour 2011. Retrieved 19 July 2011.   She was the Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the Cunninghame South constituency from 1999 until 2011, when she was defeated by the SNP's Margaret Burgess.
